mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kfashion_image ( work_no, img_data, created_datetime, updated_datetime ) VALUES ( #{workNo}, #{imgData}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, kfashion_work.work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work.created_datetime, kfashion_work_history.created_id FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work.work_state = 1 AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 1 ORDER BY kfashion_image.work_no DESC

SELECT DISTINCT count(kfashion_image.work_no) AS totalCount FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no LEFT OUTER JOIN kfashion_comment ON(kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_comment.work_no AND kfashion_comment.work_step =3) WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 2 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN (SELECT kfashion_comment.work_no FROM kfashion_comment WHERE kfashion_comment.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_comment.complete NOT IN ('Y')))
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT count(kfashion_image.work_no) AS totalCount FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no LEFT OUTER JOIN kfashion_comment ON(kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_comment.work_no AND kfashion_comment.work_step =4) WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 3 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 4 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN (SELECT kfashion_comment.work_no FROM kfashion_comment WHERE kfashion_comment.work_step = 4 AND kfashion_comment.complete NOT IN ('Y')))
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT count(kfashion_work_history.work_no) AS totalCount FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 8)
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_work.no AS work_no, kfashion_work.work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_work.created_datetime FROM kfashion_work INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_work.no = kfashion_work_history.work_no WHERE kfashion_work.no IN
(#{HistoryWorkNo})
AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 4
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{startPage}

SELECT DISTINCT count(kfashion_work.no) AS totalCount FROM kfashion_work WHERE kfashion_work.no IN
(#{HistoryWorkNo})
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT kfashion_image.work_no, kfashion_work.work_name, CONCAT('/api/v1/kfashion/img/getByteImage?workNo=',kfashion_work.no) file_name, kfashion_work_history.created_id, kfashion_work_history.updated_datetime FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no INNER JOIN kfashion_work ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work.no WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6 And kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{created_Id} ORDER BY kfashion_work_history.updated_datetime DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(kfashion_work_history.work_no)AS totalCount FROM kfashion_image INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_image.work_no = kfashion_work_history.work_no WHERE kfashion_work_history.created_id = #{createdId} AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 5 AND kfashion_work_history.work_no NOT IN(SELECT kfashion_work_history.work_no FROM kfashion_work_history WHERE kfashion_work_history.work_step = 6)

SELECT DISTINCT count(kfashion_work.no) AS totalCount FROM kfashion_work INNER JOIN kfashion_work_history ON kfashion_work.no = kfashion_work_history.work_no WHERE kfashion_work.work_state = 7
AND kfashion_work.work_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND kfashion_work_history.work_step = 8
